name: The Myth of Daji
description: In Investiture of the Gods, Daji is a white fox, a subordinate of Shiji niangniang who is the opponent of King Zhou and ordered Daji to harm King Zhou. However, Daji fell in love with King Zhou at first sight and wanted to become a human to marry him. Daji overcomes many obstacles, repeatedly risks her life to save King Zhou's life, and tastes all the immortal herbs on earth to try to become a human. By The Myth of Daji, we want to recreate Daji's throw of the dice with this roguelike card game.  A key mechanism of the game is that it demonstrates the process of Kau Cim(Lottery poetry or draw lots), which kind of assembles the effect of rolling a dice. We designed all the cards in the game as the lots to draw. Also, the whole Daji's adventure that she risks her life to be with King Zhou is one roll of the dice to her.
